pr_title: Build binaries only when src/main changes

timeline.message: Build binaries only when src/main changes
Build binaries only when src/main changes

timeline.bodyText: What about build scripts, resources, external libraries, snap changes?
timeline.author: tobiasdiez
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,18 @@
-name: Deployment
+name: Create and deploy binaries on builds.jabref.org
 
-on: [push]
+on:
+  push:
+    branches:
+      - master
+    paths:
+      - '.github/workflows/deployment.yml'

timeline.bodyText: I prefer short names as githubs interface truncates long names anyway.
timeline.author: tobiasdiez
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,18 @@
-name: Deployment
+name: Create and deploy binaries on builds.jabref.org

timeline.message: Just don't build when 100% non-binary-content is changed
